text: @CNN so? this"flu"isn't going away ever. t/fore if you get it, take care of it, get better & go back to living. its a FLU! +60,000 people die every year frm the "flu"! this covid-19 is simply a stronger strain perpetuated by incompetent decisions by incompetent govs. @realDonaldTrump
